title: Basic Tactics
sub_title: These are the basic tactics for commanding a battle. Send out your echelons once you master them!

title: Obtaining T-Dolls
sub_title: First, you must understand how to construct Tactical Dolls.

title: T-Doll Improvement
sub_title: Let's learn about the various ways in which you can improve your T-Dolls!

title: T-Doll Enhancement
sub_title: Strengthening your T-Dolls' attributes is a vital part of improving their fighting power.

title: Dummy-Linking
sub_title: This links Dummies to your T-Dolls and provides a noticeable improvement in combat effectiveness.

title: Skill Improvement
sub_title: Don't forget to level up your T-Dolls' skills!

title: Echelon Formation
sub_title: Not sure how to form an echelon? Try the Quick Formation feature.

title: Novice Tactics
sub_title: Starting to battles more difficult? Study the contents of this section to improve your combat ability!

title: Equipment Acquisition
sub_title: Gear up your Dolls with equipment to improve their performance in battle.

title: Equipment Enhancement
sub_title: Enhance your equipment to maximize their effect.

title: Intermediate Tactics
sub_title: Tactical Fairies have been introduced in Griffin. Understanding them will make your battles more successful!

title: Obtaining Fairies
sub_title: Bring Tactical Fairies into the fight!

title: Fairy Tactics
sub_title: Skillful use of fairies will make battles go smoother!

title: Advanced Tactics
sub_title: We face an increasingly ruthless battlefield. Upgrade your T-Dolls' neural clouds and deploy the Heavy Ordnance Corps!

title: Neural Upgrade
sub_title: It's is time to upgrade their neural clouds. Please help them overcome their limits.

title: Heavy Ordnance Corps
sub_title: The HOC are ready. Please proceed to improve them through further research and development.

title: Battlefield Support
sub_title: Are battles getting too difficult? Perhaps battlefield support from the Heavy Ordnance Corps can help turn the tide.

title: Colorful Life
sub_title: Everyone needs a little joy in their lives outside the battlefield, for instance pretty clothes and a nice dorm room for the T-Dolls back in the base.

title: Dormitory Customization
sub_title: Create a cozy home for your Dolls.

title: Procurement
sub_title: Obtain Doll costumes and furniture through Procurement.

title: Giving Gifts
sub_title: Give your Dolls some gifts every now and then to encourage them.

title: Commander's Wardrobe
sub_title: While buying new clothes for your Dolls, don't forget to treat yourself as well.

title: Base Diplomacy
sub_title: Meet more Commanders! Having more friends is never a bad thing.

title: Making Friends
sub_title: Why struggle alone when you can triumph together?

title: Autonomous Management
sub_title: Want to reap some extra reward while off-duty? Then try setting up some automated tasks before knocking off!

title: Logistics Support
sub_title: Send your forces out to perform logistical tasks and return with supplies as payment.

title: Auto-Battle
sub_title: After ordering an Auto-Battle, the T-Dolls will head into battle on their own and return with mission rewards and experience.

title: Forward Basecamp
sub_title: Deploy Dolls on expeditions to obtain generous rewards.
